title: Villainous Daughter Aims for the Last Boss - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Broken Engagement   Business Management   Businessmen   Calm Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Kuudere   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Nobles   Otome Game   Politics   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Saints   Sword And Magic   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Nagase Sarasa   永瀬さらさ
description:
Due to the shock of having my engagement broken, I was able to recover the memories of my previous life. This is the world of the otome game of my previous life, is not it? If so, then as the villainess I'll get caught up in the battle between the heroine and the demon king and die…… please tell me this is a joke! If this is so, then I'll avoid that death flag by conquering The Last Boss (Demon King)!

This is the story where the villainess gives the heroine, her former fiance, and childhood friend their just deserts, starts her own enterprise, increases subordinate (manservant) count, and gets loved by the Demon King.>
